Rdicount Markdown Syntax

Escape

Escape: /

Headers

/# This is an H1 /#

/## This is an H2 /##

/### This is an H3 /###

Emphasis

Italic *

Italic with star

Bolded **

Bolded

Block Quotes

> block quote

List

* Item 1 * Item 2 * Item 3

  • Item 1
  • Item 2
  • Item 3

Code Style

`print “Hello World”`

print "Hello World"

use [tab]

def functionA(a, b):
    return a + b

use {hightlight}+% {endhighlight}+%

def codeA(a,b):
    print a + b

Links

[my link text](https://mzdu.github.io)

my link text

Link Only

<http://mzdu.github.io> http://mzdu.github.io

Images

![My image link text](https://avatars1.githubusercontent.com/u/1903316?v=3&s=460 =150x50)

Centering

-> this will be centered <-

this will be centered

MacOS Questions and Answers Collection

  1. Permissions: Why do I always have to type ‘sudo’ before every command?

Use sudo su or sudo -i to get an interactive root shell.

  1. Launch Sublime Text 2 from the Mac OS X Terminal

https://gist.github.com/artero/1236170

Google App Engine SDK Path

Where is the Google App Engine SDK path on OSX?

Answer:

/usr/local/google_appengine

that’s a symlink that links to the SDK.
